about_the_game:
Embark on a fast paced adventure in Chooing, the electrifying fusion of Snake and tank battle! Engage in blistering battles as you obliterate your foes with a barrage of firepower or outmaneuver them with foxy tactics. Seize powerful enhancements to make bigger your arsenal and weave thru the chaos with lightning-rapid reflexes. It's a pulse-pounding race to domination where every twist and turn could spell victory or defeat! Are you ready to unleash mayhem and declare the throne in Chooing?

Chooing is a casual PvP game that blends classic arcade elements with modern gameplay. Set in the wild west, you'll control various characters with distinct abilities, but they all share one common trait they can get very long! This length enables you to corner your rivals and secure their defeat, or opt for the direct approach and shoot them down, or be sneaky and avoid combat until you are too strong to be defeated. Anything goes to ensure you're the last one standing. But be cautious, once you start moving, you cannot stop. There's only one way: forward!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play
